data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Alexandre Boucaut blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Antwerp.
Saido Berahino is on a sub for Lucas Ribeiro for Charleroi.
Own goal! Abdoulaye Seck scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
In the minute 57, Ivan Leko is making the team's first substitution at Bosuilstadion with Koji Miyoshi replacing Nana Opoku Ampomah.
Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a second substitution, with Cristian Benavente replacing Lior Refaelov.
Massimo Bruno is replacing Amine Benchaib for Charleroi at Bosuilstadion.
In the minute 68, The home team have replaced Jordan Lukaku with Simen Juklerod. This is the third substitution made today by Ivan Leko.
Cristian Benavente gets an equalizer for Antwerp. The score is now 1-1.
Simen Juklerod instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 78, Dieumerci Mbokani is on target to give Antwerp a 2-1 advantage.
The away team have replaced Kayembe with Modou Diagne. This is the third substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
Karim Belhocine (Charleroi) is making a fourth substitution, with Lukasz Teodorczyk replacing Guillaume Gillet.
In the minute 87, Dieumerci Mbokani (Antwerp) has received a first yellow card.
Alexis De Sart is replacing Pieter Gerkens for the home team.
The home team replace Aurelio Buta with Nill De Pauw.
The match has come to a close in Antwerp. The final score is 2-1.
Modou Diagne (Charleroi) has received a yellow card from Alexandre Boucaut.
